articles.description: Elizabeth Debicki's mannerisms as Princess Diana are so spot on as she re-creates the famous BBC interview from 1995 in The Crown Season 5.

articles.description: A FORMER I’m A Celebrity campmate has revealed how she believes one of the show’s stars is “manipulating” the camp. Gillian McKeith has today spoken exclusively to The Sun a…
articles.content:
